sentences.sContent: Shadowing the Silk Road, it had crossed the vast Eurasian steppe, traversed the Anatolian peninsula, and arrived in Crimea on the Black Sea.
sentences.sContent_eng: Shadowing the Silk Road, it had crossed the vast Eurasian steppe, traversed the Anatolian peninsula, and arrived in Crimea on the Black Sea.
sentences.sCn: 它沿着丝绸之路，跨过广阔的欧洲大草原，横穿安那托利亚半岛，最后来到位于黑海之滨的克里米亚。

synos.tran: [地理]大草原，干草原（特指西伯利亚一带没有树木的大草原）

remMethod.val: step(步) + pe → 在大草原漫步一定很惬意 → 无树木的大草原

trans.tranOther: a large area of land without trees, especially in Russia, Asia, and eastern Europe
